source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT SRC_SCHEMA_NM ,SRC_TABLE_NM ,SRC_QUERY,TGT_SCHEMA_NM,TGT_TABLE_NM,LOAD_TYPE,SRC_TYPE,SRC_KEYVAULT_NM,TGT_KEYVAULT_NM 
 FROM DBO.INGESTION_METADATA 
 WHERE INGESTION_FLAG='Y' 
	   AND LOAD_TYPE='HIST'  
	   AND SRC_TYPE='SQL ON-PREM'
	   Order by EXEC_SEQUENCE

scripts.text:
IF not exists(select top 1 1 from data.COOType where COOId=-2 and [Name]='Non Drug Product' and BiGram='X6' and TriGram='STL' and Number=1001 and IsCompliant=0)
begin
	INSERT INTO  data.COOType (COOId, Name, BiGram,TriGram,Number,IsCompliant,CreatedDate,LastUpdateDate,LastUpdateUser)
		VALUES (-2, 'Non Drug Product','X6','STL',1001,0,GETUTCDATE(),GETUTCDATE(),null);
end
else
begin
	print 'Data Already exists';
end

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT ISNULL(MAX(BATCH_ID),0)+1 as BATCH_ID FROM DBO.BATCH_JOB_ACTIVITY_AUDIT  WHERE STATUS='SUCCEEDED'

SELECT 
 MTD.SRC_SCHEMA_NM ,MTD.SRC_TABLE_NM ,MTD.SRC_QUERY,MTD.TGT_SCHEMA_NM,MTD.TGT_TABLE_NM,MTD.LOAD_TYPE,MTD.SRC_TYPE,MTD.SRC_KEYVAULT_NM,MTD.TGT_KEYVAULT_NM, BJA.BATCH_ID
 FROM dbo.Ingestion_Metadata MTD
 INNER JOIN 
 (SELECT SRC_TBL_NM , TGT_TBL_NM,BATCH_ID FROM DBO.BATCH_JOB_ACTIVITY_AUDIT WHERE  BATCH_ID=(SELECT ISNULL(MAX(BATCH_ID),0) AS BATCH_ID FROM DBO.BATCH_JOB_ACTIVITY_AUDIT WHERE STATUS='FAILED') AND  STATUS='FAILED')BJA
 ON 
 concat(MTD.SRC_SCHEMA_NM,'.',MTD.SRC_TABLE_NM)=BJA.SRC_TBL_NM
 AND 
 concat(MTD.TGT_SCHEMA_NM,'.',MTD.TGT_TABLE_NM)=BJA.TGT_TBL_NM
 AND  MTD.INGESTION_FLAG='Y' and MTD.LOAD_TYPE='HIST' and MTD.SRC_TYPE='SQL ON-PREM'

SELECT 
 MTD.SRC_SCHEMA_NM ,MTD.SRC_TABLE_NM ,MTD.SRC_QUERY,MTD.TGT_SCHEMA_NM,MTD.TGT_TABLE_NM,MTD.LOAD_TYPE,MTD.SRC_TYPE,MTD.SRC_KEYVAULT_NM,MTD.TGT_KEYVAULT_NM, BJA.BATCH_ID
 FROM dbo.Ingestion_Metadata MTD
 INNER JOIN 
 (SELECT SRC_TBL_NM , TGT_TBL_NM,BATCH_ID FROM DBO.BATCH_JOB_ACTIVITY_AUDIT WHERE  BATCH_ID=(SELECT ISNULL(MAX(BATCH_ID),0) AS BATCH_ID FROM DBO.BATCH_JOB_ACTIVITY_AUDIT WHERE STATUS='FAILED') AND  STATUS='FAILED')BJA
 ON 
 concat(MTD.SRC_SCHEMA_NM,'.',MTD.SRC_TABLE_NM)=BJA.SRC_TBL_NM
 AND 
 concat(MTD.TGT_SCHEMA_NM,'.',MTD.TGT_TABLE_NM)=BJA.TGT_TBL_NM
 AND  MTD.INGESTION_FLAG='Y' and MTD.LOAD_TYPE='DAILY' and MTD.SRC_TYPE='SAP HANA'

{"Body_Message":"The @{item().SupplierName} account in the McKesson TAA Portal has items that require certification information, in accordance with guidelines set by 48 CFR 52.225-5 (www.acquisition.gov/far/52.225-5).

Please login to the McKesson TAA Portal at https://taaportal.mckesson.com to provide the required information immediately.  If you require assistance or have additional questions, please review the Help/FAQ and Contact Us pages in the Supplier Portal.

As the Pharmaceutical Prime Vender (PPV) for the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) and other Government agencies; henceforth referred collectively as Prime Contracts.  McKesson is required to obtain information from its Suppliers per the following requirements:

  I.   Certification to McKesson the status of compliance with the Trade Agreements Act (TAA) for all products supplied through government contracts.

 II.   Suppliers providing generic products under the VA PPV contract are required to identify and certify to McKesson which of its products meet the following requirements of the Wholesale Acquisition Cost Based Price Generics Program (WPBG):

  a.   Is a generic pharmaceutical;
  b.   Is approved by the U.S. Food & Drug Administration (FDA);
  c.   Is assigned an FDA-approved National Drug Code (NDC);
  d.   Has a published Wholesale Acquisition Cost (WAC); and
  e.   Is compliant with the Trade Agreements Act by being a designated-country end - product.

It is vitally important that McKesson require suppliers to ensure, both at the start of the contract performance and on a regular basis throughout the life of the contract, that items offered for sale to the government through McKesson are compliant with the Trade Agreements Act. McKesson has established the McKesson TAA Portal to help our suppliers provide the required information. Failure to complete a certification may have an adverse impact on sales of your products until the certification is completed.

Your participation in McKesson’s Trade Agreements Act annual certification is important and greatly appreciated.", "Ingestion_Layer":"Quarterly", "Primary_Emails":"@{item().PrimaryEmail}", "Recipient_Emails":"@{item().Recipients}", "Subject_Message":"McKesson TAA Portal – Not Certified Products"}
